entry.title: 6 Pack 14" Orange Paper Tissue Fluffy Pom Pom Flower Balls
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3300
Type: Decorations
Price: 3.99

[About]

Material: Paper
Dimensions: 14" Diameter
Easy to assemble.
One order is for 6 pom poms
You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Dimensions: 14" Diameter
  • Easy to assemble.
  • One order is for 6 pom poms
  • You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
  • Uses : Wedding, Event, Birthday, Party, Ceiling Decoration, Hanging Decor

entry.title: 6 Pack Aqua Blue & Turquoise Giant Paper Flowers Peony Assorted Sizes - 12" | 16" | 20"
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3400
Type: Paper Flowers
Price: 15.99 - 90.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Paper
Type: Peony
1 Qty: 6 Flowers
Sizes: 12", 16" & 20" (2 pcs each)
Colors: 2 Colors (Periwinkle & Turquoise)
Note: Video Tutorial Included on web page . For access, click on the YouTube icon.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

With their delicate beauty and cheerful colors, flowers have always been the top rank decoration for designers, decorators, and event planners. And with our intricately handcrafted Paper Peony Giant Flowers, you can now give an everlasting radiant color to your Party Tables, Centerpieces, Garden Décor, Backdrops, Photo Booths, etc. Imitating the strikingly natural construction of real Peonies, these giant 3D paper peony blossoms feature gorgeous layers of fluffed petals and fully detailed pistil center. With the sturdy backing, these giant flowers have the ability to hang on walls or curtains, or for a long lasting setup, use with our Glue Dots to stick strongly on backgrounds, walls, tables, arches, aisle, trees, ceiling, and any other space that deserves a boost of colorful magic. 

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Type: Peony
  • 1 Qty: 6 Flowers 
  • Sizes: 12", 16" & 20" (2 pcs each)
  • Colors: 2 Colors (Periwinkle & Turquoise)
  • Note: Video Tutorial Included on web page . For access, click on the YouTube icon.
  • Uses: Home decor, Wedding Decoration Backdrop Flower, DIY Art Flower Crafts, Dinner party, Baby Bridal showers.

entry.title: 10 Pack | 13" Gold Cardboard Charger Plates, Disposable Round Serving Tray with Scalloped Rims - 1100 GSM
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5440
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.29

[About]

Quantity: 10 Round Charger Plates
Material: 1100 GSM Paper
Color: Gold
Shape: Round
Style: Scalloped Charger
Total Size: 12.75" Diameter
Thickness: 1mm
Depth: 0.25"
Features: High quality food-grade paper material, Odorless, Thick, and Durable disposable
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

1100 GSM Gold Charger Plates

Flaunting a sparkling appearance and chic scalloped edges, our upscale charger plates are great for enhancing food presentation at your catered events, culinary functions, outdoor reception, weddings, banquets, and even festive holiday dining. Artistically handcrafted from robust high grade 1100 GSM paper, this charger plate is strong enough to withstand possible wear and tear, thus giving you an elegant service plate or under plate to dress up your dining tables.

Round Serving Tray

Stylish scalloped rims coupled with glistening metallic finish together will impart a regal accent to your table settings. With its 12.75" diameter, this charger plate can easily be paired with a 10" dinner plate and 7" salad plate to create a table with a mix of patterns and finishes that will surely impress your guests.

Multipurpose & Versatile

Highly impressive in appearance and equally versatile in application, this multipurpose charger plate can be used for serving soups, salads, and entrees. Plus it will efficiently help in preventing spills and messes by catching any excess food and will protect your plush tablecloths and covers.

 

Additional Information:

  • Inner Diameter I: 11"
  • Inner Diameter II: 10"
  • Inner Diameter III: 7.75"
  • Color and Design is on Top Side ONLY
  • Bottom Side is all White
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Uses: Perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and upscale catered events

WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe
